com.mygdx.game

Class HUD

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.InputAdapter
      • com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.Stage
        • com.mygdx.game.HUD
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.InputProcessor, com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable

    public class HUD
extends com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.Stage
    class that represents the interface displayed on top of the game where the player can check important info
